report.rawcontent: 98/W/CS/427 CONTAMINATED SLUDGE CAKE Object: To test the effect of zinc, copper or cadmium enriched sewage sludges on soil microbial activity and agricultural productivity ~ Woburn, Butt Close west. Sponsors: S.P. McGrath, A. Chaudri. The fourth year, grass. . . Design: 3 randomised blocks of 23 plots. Whole plot dimensions: 6.0 x 8.0. Treatments: SLUDGE T1 None (duplicated) T2 Uncontaminated, digested low rate (quadruplicated) v3 Uncontaminated, undigested low rate (duplicated) T4 Zine 150 TS Zinc 250 T6 Zinc 350 v7 Zine 450 T8 Copper 50 7: ° Copper 100 710 Copper 150 T11 Copper 200 712 Cadmium 1 T13 Cadmium 2 T14 Cadmium 3 T15 Cadmium 4 316 Uncontaminated, digested low rate + nitrogen (duplicated) T17 Uncontaminated, undigested low rate - nitrogen (duplicated) T18 Zine 15 kg per annum T19 Copper 7.5 kg per annum T20 Cadmium 0.15 k¢ per annua Experimental diary: 26-Jun-97 : ® : Sludges applied as treatment. 29-Jul-97 : B : Mechanical spade cultivated. 03-Sep-97 : B : Rolled. 10-Sep-97 : B : Gallup at 6.0 1 in 2001. 18-Sep-97 : B : Rotary harrowed, Atalja Italian Ryegrass, drilled at 40 kg. 22-Sep-97 : B : Rolled. 31-Mar-98 : B : Muriate of potash at 120 kg. 34.5% N at 261 kg. 07-Apr-98 : T : SLUDGE Tl, T19, T20: Triple superphosphate at 64 kg. f 07-Apr-98 : P : SLUDGE Tl, Ti6, T17, T18, T19, T20: 27% N at 222 kg. 09-May-98 : B : Legumex Extra at 7.0 1 in 200 1. 02-Jul-98 : B : Cut. 09-Sep-98 : B : Cut, no yields 76

99/W/C8/427 CONTAMINATED SLUDGE CAKE Object: To test the effect of zinc, copper or cadmium enriched sewage sludges on soil microbial activity and agricultural productivity - Woburn, Butt Close West, Sponsors: $.P. McGrath, A. Chaudri. The fifth year, w. wheat. For previous years see 98/W/CS/427. Design: 3 randomised blocks of 23 plots. Whole plot dimensions: 6.0 x 8.0. Treatments: SLUDGE T1 None (duplicated) T2 Uncontaminated, digested low rate (quadruplicated) 73 Uncontaminated, undigested low rate (duplicated) Ta Zine 150 TS Zine 250 T6 Zine 350 77 Zinc 450 Ts Copper 50 79 Copper 100 710 Copper 150 T11 Copper 200 T12 Cadmium 1 T13 Cadmium 2 T14 Cadmium 3 T15 Cadmium 4 T16 Uncontaminated, digested low rate + nitrogen (duplicated) 717 Uncontaminated, undigested low rate + nitrogen (duplicated) 718 Zinc 15 kg per annum Tv19 - Copper 7.5 kg per annum T20 Cadmium 0.15 kg per annum Experimental diary: 24-Sep-98 : B: : tm)Alpha Glyphogan at 3.0 1 in 200 1. Anchor, at 380 seeds/m with the Accord drill. 23-Nov-98 : B: : Decoy at 5.0 kg. 19-Mar-99 : B: + tm)Xsoguard at 2.0 1 in 200 1. 2B: : tm)Platform S$ at 1.0 kg in 200 1. 03-Apr-99 : B: : 34.5% N at 116 kg. 25-Apr-99 : B: : tm)Folicur at 0.5 1 in 200 1. : B: : tm)Tripart Brevis at 2.0 1 in 200 1. 29-Apr-99 : B: : Muriate of potash at 150 kg. 27% N at 370 kg. 7 99/#/C8/427 Experimental diary: 07-May-99 : B: : Ally at 30 g in 200 1. 27-May-99 : B: : tm)Folicur at 0.75 1 in 200 1. : : Bs: : tm)Sipcam UK Rover 500 at 1.0 1 in 200 Ll. 22-Aug-99 : B: : Combine harvested, straw chopped. 00/W/CS/427 CONTAMINATED SLUDGE CAKE Object: To test the effect of zinc, copper or cadmium enriched sewage sludges on soil microbial activity and agricultural productivity - Woburn, Butt Close west. Sponsors: S.P. McGrath, A. Chaudri. The sixth year, grass. For previous years see 98-99/W/CS/427. Design: 3 randomised blocks of 23 plots. , Whole plot dimensions: 6.0 x 8.0. Treatments: SLUDGE T1 None (duplicated) T2 Uncontaminated, digested low rate (duplicated) T3 Uncontaminated, undigested low rate T4 zinc 150 TS Zinc 250 T6 Zinc 350 TP Zinc 450 T8 Copper 50 T9 Copper 100 T10 Copper 150 T11 Copper 200 T12 Cadmium 1 T13 Cadmium 2 T14 Cadmium 3 T15 Cadmium 4 716 Uncontaminated, digested low rate + nitrogen (duplicated) T17 Uncontaminated, undigested low rate + nitrogen T18 Zinc 15 kg per annum T19 Copper 7.5 kg per annum T20 Cadmium 0.15 kg per annum Experimental diary: 25-Sep-99 : B: : Treatments applied. Mechanical spade cultivated three times. 05-Oct-99 : B: : Rotary harrowed. 12-Oct-99 : B: : Broadcast Cotswold ryegrass Mix A at 40 kg. Rolled. 12-Nov-99 : B: : Spannit at 1.5 1 in 1001. 25-Feb-00 : B: : Muriate of potash at 100 kg. 34.5% N at 116 kg. : © : T1,T19,T20 : Triple superphosphate at 63.8 kg. 19-Mar-00 : fT: : Legumex Extra at 7.0 1 in 200 1. 07-Apr-00 : B: : Broadcast Danergo and Ligrane ryegrass 50:50 mix at 30 kg. 11-Apr-00 : B: : 27.0% N at 259 kg. 72
